metadata.title: CVE-2023-42667 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper isolation in the Intel(R) Core(TM) Ultra Processor stream cachemechanism may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalationof privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240813.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240813.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm2').
